name: Welcome to adulthood
description:
Welcome to adulthood!

You finally got the house of your dreams, the dog you always wanted, a top-of-the-line robot vacuum cleaner, and a little bundle of joy. 

However, it is not all cracked up to be. Your house is tiny, your dog is running around with explosive diarrhea, you can never seem to turn off the vacuum cleaner, and your bundle is floating everywhere.

Objective:

Try to keep your child safe from being run over by the vacuum cleaner and keep your house clean by picking up the poop and throw in the trashcan. Survive until 20:00. 

Controls:

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys to move 

'E' for pick up/put down the baby or poop

'R' to clean poop smears
